tool_description: Take a string of text (maximum 500 words eg: ad copy, about page text, landing page text and returns a list of Facebook Interests that and a match score between 0 & 1 that can be used to refine Facebook Ad targetting.
name: Facebook Interest Match
title: Facebook Interest Match

api_list.name: Compare
api_list.description: Take a string of text (maximum 500 words eg: ad copy, about page text, landing page text and returns a list of Facebook Interests that and a match score between 0 & 1 that can be used to refine Facebook Ad targeting.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://facebook-interest-match.p.rapidapi.com/compare"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "facebook-interest-match.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://facebook-interest-match.p.rapidapi.com/compare"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "facebook-interest-match.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
